newsitem.title: USA: Orphan Medical licenses polymer device.
newsitem.headline: Orphan Medical licenses polymer device.

text.p: Orphan Medical Inc said Tuesday it licensed a drug/device combination containing 5FU (5-fluorouracil) and a biodegradable polymer.
Designed to be implanted during conventional glaucoma surgery, this product slowly releases 5FU to control the inflammation and scarring associated with the post-surgical wound healing process.

Orphan Medical said it licensed the drug/device combination from the Bascom Palmer Eye Institute at the University of Miami School of Medicine and has rights to develop and market it in the United States, Japan and Canada.
